document.full_text: veteran marketing executive laurel j. richie was hired to lead the w.n.b.a. on thursday, becoming the league's third president as it enters its 15th season.
document.title: marketing veteran richie new w.n.b.a. president
lines_and_colors: veteran marketing executive laurel j. richie was hired to lead the w.n.b.a. on thursday, becoming the league's third president as it enters its 15th season.
